analyzed: su zhig sbyong ba tshol bar byed //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te /

analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: bdag gi skye ba zad do //

original: tshangs par spyad pa la bsten to //
analyzed: tshangs par spyad pa la bsten to //

analyzed: bya ba byas so //

analyzed: btsun pa bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan te /

analyzed: kun dga' bo nam gyi dus na nam mkha' la rlung mo che ldang ngo //

analyzed: nam mkha' la rlung mo che langs pas chu bskyod do //

analyzed: chu bskyod pas sa g-yo bar 'gyur te /

original: kun dga' bo 'di ni /
analyzed: kun dga' bo 'di ni /
